verbs.description: Washington Post “ Fact Checker ” Glenn Kessler [V: has] concentrated most of his firepower on Donald Trump . A June 1 blog post touted “ President Trump has made 3,251 false or misleading claims in 497 days . " So Kessler offered a tiny nod toward balance on Monday by picking apart two claims Bill Clinton made when he had a " meltdown " with NBC ’s Craig Melvin .
